languages.text: "Ты и исторг{mf||ла} одни мои сомнения, {mf|сыне|дщерь}, но дал{mf||а} пищу для новых. Я сделаю то, что должно — мои верующие помогут тебе в битве. А после... После я найду новый путь".
"You have both banished some of my doubts and given me food for others. I will do what must be done. My faithful will assist you in battle. And afterward... I will find a new path."
languages.original_text: "Ты и исторг{mf||ла} одни мои сомнения, {mf|сыне|дщерь}, но дал{mf||а} пищу для новых. Я сделаю то, что должно — мои верующие помогут тебе в битве. А после... После я найду новый путь".

traits.locale_text: "You have both banished some of my doubts, my {mf|son|daughter}, and given me food for others. I will do what must be done. My faithful will assist you in battle. And afterwards... I will find a new path."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "You have both banished some of my doubts and given me food for others. I will do what must be done. My faithful will assist you in battle. And afterward... I will find a new path."

languages.text: “你消除了我的一部分疑虑，又为我带来了新的疑虑。我会把必须做的事情做好，我虔诚的信徒会协助你参加战斗。等这一切结束之后……我会找到新的道路。”
languages.original_text: "You have both banished some of my doubts and given me food for others. I will do what must be done. My faithful will assist you in battle. And afterward... I will find a new path."

traits.locale_text: “你消除了我的一部分疑虑，又为我带来了新的疑虑，我的{mf|孩子|女儿}。我会把必须做的事情做好，我虔诚的信徒会协助你参加战斗。等这一切结束之后……我会找到新的道路。”
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: 「お前は私の迷いを追い払った。そして、考える機会を与えてくれた。私はやるべきことをやろう。まずは信者たちが戦でお前を助けてくれるだろう。その後は…新しい道を見つけようと思う」
languages.original_text: "You have both banished some of my doubts and given me food for others. I will do what must be done. My faithful will assist you in battle. And afterward... I will find a new path."

traits.locale_text: 「お前は私の迷いを追い払った。そして、考える機会を与えてくれた。私はやるべきことをやろう。まずは信者たちが戦でお前を助けてくれるだろう。その後は…新しい道を見つけようと思う」
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: «Ambos han desterrado algunas de mis dudas y alimentado otras. Haré lo que deba hacerse. Mis fieles les asistirán en batalla y después... encontraré un nuevo camino».
languages.original_text: "You have both banished some of my doubts and given me food for others. I will do what must be done. My faithful will assist you in battle. And afterward... I will find a new path."

traits.locale_text: «Ambos han desterrado algunas de mis dudas y alimentado otras, hij{mf|o|a} mí{mf|o|a}. Haré lo que deba hacerse. Mis fieles les asistirán en batalla y después... encontraré un nuevo camino».
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "Ihr habt einige meiner Zweifel beseitigt und mir zu anderen einiges zum Nachdenken gegeben. Ich werde tun, was getan werden muss. Meine Anhänger werden Euch im Kampf unterstützen. Und danach ... werde ich einen neuen Pfad finden."
languages.original_text: "You have both banished some of my doubts and given me food for others. I will do what must be done. My faithful will assist you in battle. And afterward... I will find a new path."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt einige meiner Zweifel beseitigt, {mf|mein Sohn|meine Tochter}, und mir zu anderen einiges zum Nachdenken gegeben. Ich werde tun, was getan werden muss. Meine Anhänger werden Euch im Kampf unterstützen. Und danach ... werde ich einen neuen Pfad finden."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: « Vous avez dissipé certains de mes doutes, mais en avez nourri d'autres. Je ferai ce qui doit être fait. Mes fidèles se joindront à vous au combat. Et après cela... je trouverai une autre voie. »
languages.original_text: "You have both banished some of my doubts and given me food for others. I will do what must be done. My faithful will assist you in battle. And afterward... I will find a new path."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez dissipé certains de mes doutes, {mf|mon fils|ma fille}, mais en avez nourri d'autres. Je ferai ce qui doit être fait. Mes fidèles se joindront à vous au combat. Ensuite... je trouverai une autre voie. »
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "Şüphelerimin bazılarını giderdin, bazılarıyla ise beni besledin. Yapılması gerekeni yapacağım. Yanımdaki inananlar savaşta seni destekleyecek. Sonrasında ise... Kendime yeni bir yol bulacağım."
languages.original_text: "You have both banished some of my doubts and given me food for others. I will do what must be done. My faithful will assist you in battle. And afterward... I will find a new path."

traits.locale_text: "Şüphelerimin bazılarını giderdin, bazılarıyla ise beni besledin. Yapılması gerekeni yapacağım. Yanımdaki inananlar seni savaşta destekleyecek. Sonrasında ise... Kendime yeni bir yol bulacağım."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04
